title: Design Architecture for Real-Time Energy Redistribution System
description: Define the system architecture that allows real-time energy redistribution to minimize losses and improve efficiency.

title: Define Energy Redistribution Algorithm
description: Develop an algorithm that optimizes the distribution of energy in real-time to minimize losses.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Energy Redistribution System

title: Develop Real-Time Data Collection and Processing System
description: Create a system to collect and process real-time data from various energy sources for efficient distribution.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Energy Redistribution System

title: Develop User Interface for System Monitoring and Control
description: Create a user interface that allows operators to monitor and control the system in real-time.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Energy Redistribution System

title: Create Database Schema for Energy Distribution Data Storage
description: Design a database schema to store the energy distribution data for analysis and reporting purposes.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Energy Redistribution System

title: Implement DevOps Practices for Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Implement DevOps practices to ensure continuous integration, testing, and deployment of the system.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Energy Redistribution System

title: Perform Security Audit of the Entire System
description: Conduct a security audit to identify potential vulnerabilities and implement necessary measures.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Energy Redistribution System

title: Write Technical Documentation for RedEnergiaAutonoma
description: Write comprehensive and detailed technical documentation for the RedEnergiaAutonoma project, including system architecture, functional specifications, API references, and operational guidelines.
